comment.author: 38979647@N06
comment._content:
What's the story behind this picture?  What year and what location?  If you have the info... please.

It's an amazing photo of faces long gone and it only makes me curious to know more.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi Kia in Hawaii,
Sorry about the lack of information; we seem to have had a glitch there.  The proper title and archival description are now posted, so you'll be able to learn more about this fascinating image.  Thanks for your interest!

Kristen (U.S. National Archives)
